examples.example: 我在努力工作的同时，也不忘享受生活的乐趣。

translate.english: While I am working hard, I also don't forget to enjoy the pleasure of life.

examples.example: 我在提升自己专业能力的同时，也积极参与社交活动拓展人脉。

translate.english: While I am improving my professional ability, I also actively participate in social activities to expand my network.

examples.example: 我在认真学习的同时，也积极参加体育锻炼来保持健康。

translate.english: While I am studying seriously, I also actively participate in physical exercises to keep healthy.
